Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatterer.kik.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Object representation of message received by the bot
    Author:
    Jack Eastman
